user_guide.title: User Guide
user_guide.content:
Bulk File Renamer - User Guide

1. ADDING FILES
   • Click "Browse Folder" to add all files from a folder
   • Click "Select Files" to choose individual files
   • Files will appear in the preview table

2. NAMING PATTERNS
   • Prefix: Text added before the filename
   • Suffix: Text added after the filename (before extension)
   • Base Name: Replace the entire filename
   • Start Number: Starting number for sequential naming
   • Extension Lock: Keep original file extensions

3. FILTERING FILES
   • Extension Filter: Filter by file types (e.g., jpg,png,txt)
   • Size Filter: Filter by file size (e.g., >1MB, <500KB)
   • Date Filter: Filter by creation date (e.g., before 2023-01-01)
   • Status Filter: Show only specific rename statuses

4. PREVIEW AND RENAME
   • Preview shows old name → new name
   • Status indicates if rename will succeed
   • Click "Rename" to apply changes
   • Use "Undo" to reverse the last rename operation

5. PROFILES
   • Save current settings as a profile
   • Load saved profiles for quick setup
   • Profiles remember all settings and filters

6. SETTINGS
   • Configure application preferences
   • Change language (English/Deutsch)
   • Adjust preview limits and behavior

7. KEYBOARD SHORTCUTS
   • Ctrl+O: Open Folder
   • Ctrl+Shift+O: Select Files
   • Ctrl+S: Save Profile
   • Ctrl+L: Load Profile
   • Ctrl+R: Rename Files
   • F5: Refresh Preview
   • Ctrl+Z: Undo Last Rename
   • Ctrl+Shift+C: Clear All Files

about.title: About Bulk File Renamer
about.content:
Bulk File Renamer
Version 1.0
A powerful, cross‑platform tool to preview and rename many files safely.

Key features:
• Add folders/files and drag & drop
• Naming: prefix, suffix, base name, start number, optional extension lock
• Auto‑clean: remove special chars, replace spaces, convert case, remove accents
• Filters: extensions, size (>, <, =), date (before/after), status
• Live preview with coloring, search, sorting and lazy loading
• Profiles: save/load settings, recent profiles with configurable limit
• Undo last/selected operations (safe reverse order)
• Optional backups (auto create subfolder), and operation logging
• Export preview (CSV / JSON) and Validate / Simulate report
• Notifications and full English/German localization
